item.description:
Join some "meeting&greeting" group members for dinner and the movie, "The Lucky One", at the Chunkys Cinema located in the Pelham Shopping Center on Route 38 (in the Hannaford Shopping plaza.).

Relax, unwind, eat dinner and then sit back in the nice comfy cadillac recliner seat to enjoy the movie "from the acclaimed bestselling author of The Notebook and Dear John, starring Zac Efron and Taylor Schilling", http://theluckyonemovie.warnerbros.com/index.html

Showtime - 7:00PM, 6:15 in the lobby

Admission - $7.50

"Be the Lucky One",  8 Discount admission tickets available from Susan for $5.00 (for the first 8 signups).  meet me in the lobby by 6:15pm to get your pass
item.how_to_find_us: meet in the lobby at 6:15pm, I'll have a meetup badge on

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: "The Lucky One" at Chunky's Cinema in Pelham
